scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.build:api: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.build:web: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.docker:restart: docker compose down && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
